item.title: Hello World
item.author: xxxx
item.description: My blog journey. Notion It has been a long time since I thought about having a blog. In 2017 I met notion, where pages could be shared as a link which is definitely OK for a blog. However connecting from China is sometimes unstable and — the appearance. Now I am using notion’s database as a cross-platform bookmark and sometimes a to-do list. Pelican In 2019, I met Github Pages and static web frameworks, and chose Pelican because I’m familiar with Python.
